Quotes: I no longer believe that freedom and democracy are compatible. | One suspects that democracy is exhausted, and that we have to ask some questions very far outside the Overton window. | If we want to increase freedom, we want to increase the number of countries. | The education of the average American has become a fool's errand. | Since 1920, the vast increase in welfare beneficiaries and the extension of the franchise to women have rendered the notion of 'capitalist democracy' into an oxymoron. | Mordor is this technological civilization based on reason and science.
